en: After the fall of the Roman Empire, the technology to make concrete was lost for 1000 years.

Ancient Rome had a 4-story-tall shopping mall with 150 shops and offices.

Hypnotism is banned in public schools in San Diego (U.S.).
A Chinese checkerboard has 121 holes.
Americans throw away 44 million newspapers a day.

Finland has the largest number of islands in the world (over 179,550).

Paper originated from China.

Quito in Ecuador, South America, is said to have the most pleasant climate in the world. It is called the 'Land of Eternal Spring.' The temperature rarely drops below 46 degrees Fahrenheit during the night, or exceed 72 degrees Fahrenheit during the day.
The most dangerous job in the United States, is that of fisherman, followed by logging and then garbage collection.

Mt. Athos, in northern Greece, likes to call itself an independent country. It has a population of about 4,000...all men. No females of any kind, including animals, are allowed. There are twenty monasteries within a space of twenty miles.
